DOC.brief_summary: Cryoballoon ablation of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation can be used as first-line therapy compared to second choice after failed medical therapy
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Cryoballoon Ablation of Atrial Fibrillation as First-line Therapy
DOC.criteria: paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, symptomatic atrial fibrillation other than PAF, asymptomatic, previous AF ablation
